turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I ordered a new coffee maker last week, order number is #482917, and it still hasn't shipped! The website said 3-5 business days. What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for contacting us. I understand your frustration. Let me check the status of order #482917 for you. One moment...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I'm really hoping it arrives soon. I'm almost out of coffee, and going without my morning cup is... not fun.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I see that your order is currently being processed in our warehouse and is scheduled to ship out tomorrow. You should receive a tracking number via email once it ships. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
